Academy News2024-01-15

Screensport FC Launches Elite Academy Program

SFMT
Screensport FC Media Team
üì∞

Screensport FC is proud to introduce our Elite Academy Program, a comprehensive 16-week training curriculum designed for serious players looking to take their game to the next level. The program features advanced tactical training, position-specific coaching, and college recruitment preparation. Led by UEFA A licensed coach Michael Rodriguez, the program includes video analysis sessions, mental preparation workshops, and exposure to college scouts. Training sessions are held three times per week with additional weekend matches against other elite academies. The program has already seen success with several players earning college scholarships and professional trials.

Screensport FC

Developing young football talents with world-class training facilities and experienced coaching staff.
